messages.content: About earlier: the project outline still feels anxious. I tried made a rough draft and it helped a little.

Last time, you were feeling anxious around the project outline, with a messy start getting in the way. You are not failing here; this is what iteration looks like. I am with you on this. Next step: Name what you will not do, then do one thing you will. Should we keep continuity tight, or allow a clean reset?
